operation_gone_rogue.body: The operation "{{operation}}" is now in the ROGUE state: the vehicles may be out of their reserved Volume. Advise all nearby vehicles

pilot_homescreen:

 First stable release! Welcome!
operation_state_changed_text: The operation *{{name}}* is now in the **{{state}}** state
passwords_are_not_equal: The passwords are not equal. Please, try again.
email_is_not_valid: The email entered does not follow the guidelines. Please, check the email entered is correct.
reason: Reason for accepting or rejecting the operation
